title: FantasyGame1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/XUdW-cCtfI0 < Youtube Preview



📖Overview.

The Fantasy Game SFX Pack is a comprehensive collection of sound effects designed for use in a variety of projects, including games, movies, animations, and more. This pack features 105 high-quality audio clips that encompass the enchanting world of fantasy. From skill and action sounds to immersive environmental effects like water, stone, wind, and lightning, this pack provides everything you need to enhance the audio experience of your project.



🕹️Functionality.


  • Diverse Sound Effects: The pack includes a wide range of fantasy-themed sound effects, perfect for bringing your imaginative worlds to life.
  • Skill and Action Sounds: Engage players and viewers with captivating skill and action sound effects that enhance gameplay and storytelling.
  • Immersive Environmental Effects: Create a vivid fantasy atmosphere with poly sounds of elements like water, stone, wind, and lightning.
  • Versatile Usage: Suitable for a wide range of projects, including games, movies, animations, and more.



📂FILES. (TrackList)


  • Action Electricity 5
  • Action Fire 7
  • Action Ice 2
  • Action Metal 6
  • Action Paper 12
  • Action Rock 5
  • Action Water 6
  • Crafting Paper 6
  • Door 7
  • Gained Skill 4
  • Gained Treasure 3
  • Healing 3
  • LevelUp 3
  • Location Discovered 2
  • Magic 5
  • Power Up 1
  • Ui 4
  • Unlock Attribute 3
  • Whoosh 12
  • XP Gained 2
  • Misc 7



⭐5STAR Review.


  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Diverse Sound Effects: The pack includes a wide range of fantasy-themed sound effects, perfect for bringing your imaginative worlds to life.
  • Skill and Action Sounds: Engage players and viewers with captivating skill and action sound effects that enhance gameplay and storytelling.
  • Immersive Environmental Effects: Create a vivid fantasy atmosphere with poly sounds of elements like water, stone, wind, and lightning.
  • Versatile Usage: Suitable for a wide range of projects, including games, movies, animations, and more.

Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)

Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)

Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)

Loudness & dBTP : Appropriate Loudness & 0dBTP (Standard)

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 4:00

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
